title: Wau-bun: The "Early Day" in the North-West
description: Originally published in 1901. This volume from the Cornell University Library's print collections was scanned on an APT BookScan and converted to JPG 2000 format by Kirtas Technologies. All titles scanned cover to cover and pages may include marks notations and other marginalia present in the original volume.
author: Juliette Augusta Magill Kinzie
